title: Spicy Butternut Squash and Carrot Soup

Ingredients.1: 1 medium butternut squash, peeled and cut into 2-inch cubes

Ingredients.2: 3  carrots, peeled and cut into thirds

Ingredients.9: 1  habanero pepper, seeded and chopped, or more to taste

Ingredients.11: 4 cups water, or more to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).

Directions.2: Place squash and carrots in a bowl. Drizzle with 1 tablespoon olive oil and add curry powder, chili powder, pepper, and salt. Place on a rimmed baking sheet.

Directions.3: Roast in the preheated oven until vegetables are soft, about 20 minutes.

Directions.4: Meanwhile, place onion, habanero pepper, and garlic in a pot with remaining olive oil and saute over medium heat until soft and fragrant, 5 to 7 minutes. Add water and bouillon, increase heat to medium-high, and bring to a boil. Stir in roasted squash and carrots, reduce heat, and let simmer for 10 to 15 minutes.

Directions.5: Transfer carefully to an electric blender or food processor, in batches if necessary, and blend until smooth.
